videos.name: Football
videos.description: Update ပေးရင် User ကိုအသိပေးရေးရမယ့်စာ
videos.match:
{
"servername":"https://mygoaltv.xyz/",

"elements":"div.match-list div.match",

"league":"div.league",

"date":"div.score span.vs",

"time":"div.score div.time font",

"home_team":"div.home-team img.team-logo",

"home_img":"div.home-team img.team-logo",

"away_team":"div.away-team img.team-logo",

"away_img":"div.away-team img.team-logo",

"live_href":"ul li.video-p a"




}
videos.hilight:
{
"servername":"https://www.fasthighlights.net/",

"elements":"div.row div#aft-inner-row article",

"title":"div.align-items-center div.spotlight-post figcaption h3 a",

"tag":"div.align-items-center div.spotlight-post figure.categorised-article.inside-img div.categorised-article-wrapper div.figure-categories.figure-categories-bg ul.cat-links li a",

"date":"div.align-items-center div.spotlight-post figcaption div.grid-item-metadata a",

"thumbnail":"div.align-items-center div.spotlight-post figure.categorised-article.inside-img div.categorised-article-wrapper a img",

"link":"div.align-items-center div.spotlight-post figure.categorised-article.inside-img div.categorised-article-wrapper a"


}
videos.cucai2:
{
"servername":"https://cucai2.live/",
"html_elements":"div.container div.box.box-grid.mb-0 div.box-content div.scrolling-wrapper-flexbox a",
"html_homeTeam":"div.card div.team.team-home img.team-logo-img",
"html_awayTeam":"div.card div.team.team-away img.team-logo-img",
"html_homeImg":"div.card div.team.team-home img.team-logo-img",
"html_awayImg":"div.card div.team.team-away img.team-logo-img",
"html_homeGoal":"div.card span.v-center.goals-home",
"html_awayGoal":"div.card span.v-center.goals-away",
"html_date":"div.card div.match-item-info div.time span",
"html_hour":"div.card div.match-item-info div.status span",
"html_dataStatus":"div.card div.match-item-live.d-none div.badge-live",
"html_minutes":"div.card div.match-item-live.d-none span.status_elapsed_wrapper span.status_elapsed",
"html_liveHref":"href"    }
